main.name: Hector Trejo Luna
main.description: One of my passions in life is about discover, learn and practice new web technologies, I wake up everyday thinking of a new code challenge to resolve, and I produce music and digital art too
main.bio: I like to code interesting software using high demanded technologies in the industry, I consider me as a Full Stack Web Developer, I had a background on WordPress, today I learn and practice from mastering basics (HTML, CSS, Javascript, Algorithms and Data Structures) and engage using ReactJS and NodeJS as prime Stack, I'm preparing for get the best job that kickstart my carrer as a sucessfull developer, sharp skills and learn something new everyday.
main.contactmessage: I can help you in Frontend(React) and Backend(NodeJS) web development, contact me ASAP, for shure I'm on something

education.degree: Technician Support and Maintenance of Computer Equipment

work.title: WordPress Web Developer and IT Assistant
work.description:
IT Assistant 
- Intranet Network Configuration, Windows Server, Email Server setting up.• Printers setup and support.• Ticket resolution (i.e. Problems with hardware, software ). WordPress Based Web Development:• Taking Requirements .• Hosting Administration (Billing, Support, Setting Up).• FTP Server Administrator.• MySQL Database Administrator, PhpMyAdmin.• FullStack Web Development  (php, javascript, html, css.) • ICustom Plugin Development, license administrator, Theme Customization. - Managment of analytics tools ( Google Analytics, Facebook Pixel, and more)
